name: Doctor Strange #384
summary: LOKI: SORCERER SUPREME Part 4. Doctor Strange has acquired the biggest weapon he could imagine to finally take back his Sorcerer Supreme title from Loki. But will it be enough? The life of someone Stephen cares about lies in the balance, and where Loki goes, innocent life doesn’t always stay safe…

relations.title: Doctor Strange by Donny Cates Vol. 1: God of Magic
